Resilient infrastructure refers to the design and construction of infrastructure systems that can withstand and recover quickly from natural disasters, climate change impacts, and other shocks and stresses.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: smart metering technologies
relations.Description: Smart metering technologies implement the Energy Efficiency Policy by providing real-time data on energy consumption.

relations.Subject: energy poverty indices
relations.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

Data integration is a crucial aspect of digital twins, as it involves collecting and integrating data from various sources to create a virtual representation of a physical asset or system. This allows for real-time monitoring and analysis of the asset or system's performance.
relations.Subject: data integration

relations.Description: Simulation is an important sub-element of digital twins, as it enables the creation of virtual models that mimic the behavior and performance of physical assets or systems. This allows for testing and optimization of different scenarios without the need for physical prototypes.
relations.Subject: simulation

relations.Description: Analytics is a key sub-element of digital twins, as it involves the use of advanced data analysis techniques to derive insights and make predictions based on the data collected from the virtual representation of a physical asset or system. This helps in optimizing performance and making informed decisions.
relations.Subject: analytics

relations.Description: Visualization is an essential sub-element of digital twins, as it allows for the representation of complex data and information in a visual format. This enables stakeholders to easily understand and interpret the insights derived from the virtual representation of a physical asset or system.
relations.Subject: visualization

relations.Description: Predictive maintenance is a significant sub-element of digital twins, as it involves using data and analytics to predict when maintenance or repairs are needed for a physical asset or system. This helps in optimizing maintenance schedules, reducing downtime, and improving overall asset performance.
relations.Subject: predictive maintenance
